name.value: MP9 - Server - Scenario 5.x - Receive MedicationData - MGB-Scenarioset5

description.value: Scenario 5.x - Receive MedicationData for M. XXX_Raamsdonk.
Receive MedicationData in a transaction Bundle
Test server to handle a Bundle of type transaction.
Checks if all resources specified by the scenario can be identified unambiguously.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where((( (medication.where($this is CodeableConcept).coding | medication.where($this is Reference).resolve().code.coding).exists(code = '1929461') ) and ( (medication.where($this is CodeableConcept).coding | medication.where($this is Reference).resolve().code.coding).exists(code = '86991') ) and ( (medication.where($this is CodeableConcept).coding | medication.where($this is Reference).resolve().code.coding).exists(code = '129720') ))).count() = 2

Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where((( (medication.where($this is CodeableConcept).coding | medication.where($this is Reference).resolve().code.coding).exists(code = '76333') ) and ( (medication.where($this is CodeableConcept).coding | medication.where($this is Reference).resolve().code.coding).exists(code = '122602') ))).where(extension.where(url = 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-AsAgreedIndicator').value = true).count() = 2

Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationStatement).where(((medication.where($this is CodeableConcept).coding | medication.where($this is Reference).resolve().code.coding).exists(system = 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-NullFlavor' and code = 'OTH'))).count() = 1

description.value: Confirm that the response Bundle contains 1 Medication resource that contains code '1929461|urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.7' (PRADAXA CAPSULE 110MG)
